entry.title: Bringing Hawaii to fine wine: The story of Freed Estate Winery
entry.summary: While Hawaii isn’t known for fine wine, Freed Estate Winery brings the island spirit to Oregon wine country. Located 20 minutes from Roseburg in the Winston area, this riverside vineyard has been producing wine for 25 years.

entry.title: Prescribed Burn Scheduled at Dean Creek Elk Viewing Area June 30 – July 1
entry.summary: BLM fire officials plan a prescribed burn at Dean Creek Elk Viewing Area, June 30–July 1, covering 100 acres to improve elk habitat, reduce fuels, and urging caution for Highway 38 motorists due to possible smoke and short delays.

entry.title: Umpqua Watersheds keeps educating and advocating, 30 years later
